profile_summary:
Proficient in **AI** and **Data Analysis**, with over 13 years of extensive experience in delivering technically advanced solutions and high-performance applications within regulatory frameworks. Demonstrated expertise in **Regulatory Compliance**, ensuring adherence to standards and best practices throughout project lifecycles. Strong foundation in **Project Management** and **Agile methodologies**, facilitating seamless collaboration across teams to support continuous improvement initiatives.

Additionally, I am an adept Full Stack Developer skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for both frontend and backend development. I have a proven track record in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. My experience also includes building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, ensuring effective operational excellence.
